name: save-audiobooks-user
description: Save one or more audiobooks to the current Spotify user's library.

ids.description: A comma-separated list of the [Spotify IDs](/documentation/web-api/concepts/spotify-uris-ids). For example: `ids=18yVqkdbdRvS24c0Ilj2ci,1HGw3J3NxZO1TP1BTtVhpZ`. Maximum: 50 IDs.
ids.title: Spotify Audiobook IDs
